nodes.title: Understand the concept of AFFiNE
nodes.desc: AFFiNE is a new-generation knowledge management and note-taking tool that combines the best features of note-taking apps and knowledge management systems. [AFFiNE Official Website](https://affine.pro/)

nodes.title: Learn about the features of AFFiNE
nodes.desc: AFFiNE offers a wide range of features, including note-taking, knowledge management, collaboration, and customization. [AFFiNE Documentation](https://affine.pro/docs/)

nodes.title: Learn about the AFFiNE roadmap
nodes.desc: The AFFiNE roadmap outlines the planned features and developments for future versions of AFFiNE. [AFFiNE Roadmap](https://affine.pro/roadmap/)

nodes.title: Explore the AFFiNE documentation
nodes.desc: The AFFiNE documentation provides detailed information on how to use and customize AFFiNE. [AFFiNE Documentation](https://affine.pro/docs/)

nodes.title: Discover the AFFiNE tutorials
nodes.desc: The AFFiNE tutorials provide step-by-step guides on how to use AFFiNE for various tasks. [AFFiNE Tutorials](https://affine.pro/tutorials/)

nodes.title: Learn about the AFFiNE community resources
nodes.desc: The AFFiNE community resources include a wiki, a forum, and a GitHub repository. [AFFiNE Community Resources](https://affine.pro/community/)

nodes.title: Understand the AFFiNE licensing
nodes.desc: AFFiNE is open-source software and is licensed under the Apache License 2.0. [AFFiNE Licensing](https://affine.pro/docs/licensing/)

nodes.title: Explore the AFFiNE integrations
nodes.desc: AFFiNE can be integrated with various third-party services and tools. [AFFiNE Integrations](https://affine.pro/docs/integrations/)

nodes.title: Discover the AFFiNE customization options
nodes.desc: AFFiNE provides various customization options to allow users to personalize their experience. [AFFiNE Customization](https://affine.pro/docs/customization/)

nodes.title: Learn about the AFFiNE accessibility features
nodes.desc: AFFiNE provides various accessibility features to make it usable by everyone. [AFFiNE Accessibility](https://affine.pro/docs/accessibility/)

nodes.title: Understand the AFFiNE performance optimization
nodes.desc: AFFiNE is optimized for performance and provides various features to improve its speed and efficiency. [AFFiNE Performance Optimization](https://affine.pro/docs/performance/)

nodes.title: Explore the AFFiNE data import and export options
nodes.desc: AFFiNE provides various options for importing and exporting data. [AFFiNE Data Import and Export](https://affine.pro/docs/data-import-export/)

nodes.title: Explore the benefits of using AFFiNE
nodes.desc: AFFiNE can help users to better organize their knowledge, improve their productivity, and enhance their collaboration with others. [AFFiNE Blog](https://affine.pro/blog/)

nodes.title: Discover the AFFiNE collaboration features
nodes.desc: AFFiNE provides various features to facilitate collaboration and teamwork. [AFFiNE Collaboration](https://affine.pro/docs/collaboration/)

nodes.title: Learn about the AFFiNE version control
nodes.desc: AFFiNE provides a version control system to track changes and revisions. [AFFiNE Version Control](https://affine.pro/docs/version-control/)

nodes.title: Understand the AFFiNE search functionality
nodes.desc: AFFiNE provides a powerful search functionality to quickly find and access data. [AFFiNE Search](https://affine.pro/docs/search/)

nodes.title: Discover the different use cases of AFFiNE
nodes.desc: AFFiNE can be used for various purposes, such as personal knowledge management, team collaboration, and project management. [AFFiNE Use Cases](https://affine.pro/use-cases/)

nodes.title: Learn about the AFFiNE community
nodes.desc: The AFFiNE community is a group of users and developers who contribute to the development and improvement of AFFiNE. [AFFiNE Community Forum](https://forum.affine.pro/)

nodes.title: Understand the AFFiNE architecture
nodes.desc: AFFiNE is built using modern web technologies and has a modular architecture that allows for easy customization and extension. [AFFiNE Architecture](https://affine.pro/docs/architecture/)

nodes.title: Explore the AFFiNE API
nodes.desc: The AFFiNE API allows developers to access and manipulate AFFiNE data programmatically. [AFFiNE API Documentation](https://affine.pro/docs/api/)

nodes.title: Learn about AFFiNE plugins
nodes.desc: AFFiNE plugins are extensions that can be installed to add new features and functionality to AFFiNE. [AFFiNE Plugin Documentation](https://affine.pro/docs/plugins/)

nodes.title: Discover the AFFiNE mobile app
nodes.desc: The AFFiNE mobile app allows users to access and manage their AFFiNE data on-the-go. [AFFiNE Mobile App](https://affine.pro/mobile/)

nodes.title: Understand the AFFiNE security
nodes.desc: AFFiNE takes the security of user data seriously and has implemented various measures to protect it. [AFFiNE Security](https://affine.pro/docs/security/)
